overview: I work for New Beginning TV Network, Film, Produce, Edit, Production, and I am working on a product line CD and DVD that we have produce at NBTV. I host a live tv program called Bargain Hound www.BargainHoundDeals.com if you have something to sell you need to list it on the Bargain Hound Site, only $1.00 to list a Item and their is no hidden fees, and pictures are for FREE. I am working on a site www.SaturdayNightHorseShows.com it will have horse shows that me and my friends have been in, and I hope to have my live stream up by the next show so you can watch on ustream live. Their will also be a product line in the next few weeks about every day living at the barn and horse show. I guess what every esle I can come up with to do, I will be sure to let you know.
